title: Can't Update
body: So I'm stuck at 33% and can't update I get an error saying its failed. Some feedback in the League of Legends website would be nice Riot. Like addressing that you are aware of whats happening.

replies.body: We've been collecting information and providing updates here on the boards as well as the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Everything should be okay now, and players can update without further issue!
Same issue. Getting an unspecified error and stuck at 33% 1 file scanned.

This is happening to me as well. Client crashed and now I'm stuck updating at 33%.

It finally said there was an error just now, but it just says 0 files scanned now. Nothing else has changed.
